name: Sculpt & Shape ((3 LEVEL)) Long Torso
description:
***Warning: These garments do fit tight. For a more comfortable fit do go a size above and remember that you may need assistance when putting these garments on for the first time***
This Shaper is specifically for those who has a longer torso. This shaper firms, tightens and tones your stomach while doing everyday activities. This shaper is for those who suffer from access fat bulge in their midesection. It forces good posture and also hold in your stomach so your abdominal muscles are working. The shaper is also good for those who just had a baby and tummy tucks because it molds your stomach as well get rid of toxins with its latex material and with its flexiboning holds the garment in place, preventing rolling and ride up.This garment reconstruct your structure to give a noticeable slimmer waist and midsection. With the shaper we encourage you to also eat a well balanced meal and light excercise. 

*BENEFITS*
Accelerated weight loss
Instantly reduced inches around the midsection
Reduced waistline and flattened abdomen
Corrected posture and reduced back pain

*FEATURES*
Firm compression vest
Underbust design
FlexiBoning prevents the garment from rolling up
Double hook and eye closure
High back
Adjustable straps

*Materials
Outer Lining - Latex 100% , Inner Lining - Latex 100%

 ***Disclaimer***
I do not suggest sizes!! There are numerous of different shapes, sizes, body chemistry that a woman has. So please make sure you order your size accordingly. These shapers are often fit snug/tight that is how it works and you will see results. Due to its all latex material I do suggest going a size higher than your regular size. Make sure you have your correct size/measurements. Colors varies, if for any reason we are out of the black vest you will be shipped the beige color due to high volumes of orders.

 This garment is final sale and is not returnable or exchangeable due to hygiene regulations with the manufacturer.

name: Get "Waisted" Bundle Package
description:
***Warning: These garments do fit tight. For a more comfortable fit do go a size above and remember that you may need assistance when putting these garments on for the first time***
Short Torso Length: 10.5 Inches
Long Torso Length; 12. 5 ((great for those who have lower pouch area))                        
   Get Waisted Bundle Is here!!!
Get Waisted with this amazing bundle that will definitely transform, shape and mold your body.
This bundle includes everything you need to get started. 
Bundle Includes:

*Shaper Garment*
This bundle comes with any of the shaper garment of your choice. Please refer to the individual shaper description so you are able to get the perfect shaper suitable for you and your goals. To find your size and shaper of your choice please scroll until you see the size and the correct title of the shaper garment you would like to purchase. [THERE IS A PRICE DIFFERENCE IN VESTS]

***Disclaimer*** 
I do not suggest sizes!! There are numerous of different shapes, sizes, body chemistry that a woman has. So please make sure you order your size accordingly. Go a size down for a tight fit. These shapers are often fit snug/tight that is how it works and you will see results. Make sure you have your correct size/measurements. Colors varies, if for any reason we are out of the blue shaper you will be shipped the pink, green or purple color due to high volumes of orders.
 This garment is final sale and is not returnable or exchangeable due to hygiene regulations with the manufacturer.
                                   
 ***How to measure?***
You must measure  your waist by taking the measuring tape (included in the bundle) starting from the center of your navel and measuring the circumference of your waist. For further info or description Google or YouTube "How to measure my waist"

*Compression Wrap*
Compression wraps are great to use for a total body transformation. Use on arms, thighs, stomach and/or legs. This compression wrap works as a thermogenic wrap tackling cellulite and fatty cells. The combination and daily use of caffeine cream  and compression wrap stimulates diffusion and osmosis in the organism. The compression pressure opens the lymph channels, so liquefied metabolic waste products and cell toxins can flow out of the problem zones. The wrap is a 60 ft. roll [More bang for your buck]. These wraps can be worn during your workouts and every day activities.

Ultimate Results:
Apply caffeine cream, compression wrap and shaper during your workouts. This will allow the cream to penetrate problematic areas as the compression work as a sealant where cream will not evaporate. Once cream and compression wrap is applied simply put on your Shaper garment doing so will add extra compression, tightening your abdominal area while creating that hourglass silhouette. 

***Caffeine Cream***
Caffeine-based cream helps achieve a flat stomach, a sculptural figure free of stretch marks and cellulite. When used daily with osmotic compression wrap you will notice a difference in just one day and greater results within your first week.

Ultimate Results:
Make your workouts count!! Sweat, lose inches and diminish those unwanted fat deposits. In combination with the osmotic wrap the Shaper acts a great add on to acheive a smaller waist and stomach in a short amount of time. 

Caffeine Cream contains 16 fl.oz of product to get more bang for your buck!! Jar can last up to 2-3 months when you used on body daily at least twice a day.

Ingredients:
Purified Water, Mineral Oil, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitol, Cyclomethicone, Triethanolamine, Coffee Extract, Methyl Salicylate, Caffeine, Menthol, Spiruline, Vitmain E, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Caramel Color, Kathon CG

***Measureing Tape***
To track your "Get Waisted" progress.

***Meal Plan***
This meal plan incorporates all food groups from meat to healthy fats allowing safe and efficient weight loss. Notice how crash and fad diets are just that "CRASH" diets setting those who are on a fitness journey or who wants to start up for FAILURE. These crash diets omits very important and nutritious foods. There is no calorie restrictions here. This meal plan allows you to eat well and feel great! By following this meal plan you will increase energy and decrease weight loss. Meal plan includes grocery/shopping list that is budget friendly, calendar (so you can track your progress), recipes and so much more!! So lets start your fitness journey off right and "ATTACK THE FAT!!" 

Note:
Meal plans will be submitted to the email of the purchaser within 24-48 hours. Remember to submit yours pictures to phreshservices@gmail.com so I can follow your weightloss journey.

name: Lipo Detox Herbal Tea
description:
***NEW ITEM ALERT***
Shed that unwanted belly fat and transform your body into something great!

Benefits:
Weight management 
Water retention 
Bloating 
Cleanse your digestive system
Lose inches
Boosts Energy
Speeds up metabolism

No additives, caffeine this tea can be enjoyed either hot or cold after your evening meal, or late in the afternoon. Begin by drinking only small amounts of tea and gradually increase the amount according to your needs. We suggest you start by pouring 2 cups of boiling water over 1 tea bag. Let it steep, covered for 2-3 minutes. After one week, increase the strength by pouring only one cup of boiling water over 1 tea bag. You can drink a maximum of 3 cups of tea per day. You can dilute your tea with more water if desired. Keep sealed and closed in a cool, dry place. You may experience more frequent bowl movements for the first couple days after having used Diet Slimming Tea. This is simply an indication that the tea is eliminating toxins from the digestive system..

name: Pharaoh's Gold ((Gold))
description:
Phresh Glitter is our finest 5 star, 3 dimensional cosmetic glitter. 
This glitter has many uses in the beauty world. Use this glitter to add sparkle to the eyes, lips, nails and even body. With our special mirrored jars you are able to apply your glitter anywhere!

Eyes:
To add a little sparkle to the eyes simply place a base wherever you would like the glitter to stick to. Whether it’s all over the eyelid or a hint of glitz in the inner corner of your eyes. Remember a little goes a long way.

Lips:
Apply your fave lipstick or lip gloss and simply pat the glitter onto your lips without sponge tip glitter applicator.

Nails:
1. For nail techs you can simply scoop a little glitter out and mix it with your favorite acrylic powder to give your nails and your clients’ nails that extra bling they desire.
2. Mix the Phresh glitter in your favorite nail polish and simply brush it on your nails.

Body:
Add a little glitter to your favorite body spray/mist, give it a little shake and viola a gorgeous shimmer body mist. Use for a fin night on the town or fresh out the shower.

Size: 3grams

name: Deposit For Makeup Services
description:
**Type In "SERVICES" in the coupon code to exempt shipping**

Full Face makeup {$40} application includes:
•	Brow enhancement
•	Foundation Placement
•	Eye shadow up to 3 colors
•	Lipstick/lip-gloss
•	Lip liner
•	Lash line/water line
•	Contour/highlight
•	Lashes (optional additional $5) 
•	Bottom Lashes (optional additional $5)
*Minimum of 4 women to travel. Traveling fees may occur*

Single Application/Service Prices:
Eye shadow Application: $15
Lashes (strip): $5
Bottom lashes: $5
Eyebrows Wax: $7
Eyebrow Enhancement (this gives the illusion of sculpted eyebrows): $5
Eyebrow Wax and Enhancement: $12
Eyebrow Tinting (Semi-Permanent Brows): $20 
Glitter Eyes: $5 extra 
Glitter Lips: $5 extra 
Individual Lashes (must provide your own lashes) : $15
Strip lashes and individual: $20



*Policy*
In order to secure your date and time of service a $20 non-refundable deposit is required. This includes but not limit to make-up application and special events. Cancelled appointments within the same day of appointments must resubmit deposit in order to secure another date and time and pay remaining balance once serviced. Remember you are not confirmed until you pay your deposit at least 2 days prior your desired booking. Cancelled appointments within 48 hours of service date will be refunded

*Rules*
No Men, Kids or Bystanders are allowed. The only person(s) that are allowed are those who are being serviced. Make sure you book accordingly. Changes in the weather or someone else's schedule does not exempt your tardiness so plan accordingly (Flood watches,hurricanes,death in family waives cancellation and late fees). There is a 30 minute grace period anything after is a $20 late fee charge ((In this case you will pay the balance due and late fees before services are rendered)). RULES ARE STRICTLY ENFORCED. By submitting your payment you agree to all rules and  policies stated above.

*Special Events*
Email phreshservices@gmail.com for Pricing
This includes but not limit to wrapping parties, wedding and special occasions.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Pacman
description: Light weight earrings
